Articles.Content:
I'm Zulu, a newbie at this space thing. Got the demo, crashed a few times until I found some videos telling me what to do, and have since managed a couple of (very weird) orbits... Just bought the full version, and hoping I'll get the hang of it.

Cheers

Zuli
Hello there! Glad to see you are able to make orbit. Next stop ANYWHERE! Literally, if you can make orbit you are halfway to anywhere.

Hi! Welcome aboard! Glad you're having fun with the game.

Congrats on making orbit, and how weird is it? o.o

Hi! Maybe it's my lack of design skills or I'm just a lousy pilot, but I never manage to keep my socket on the 90 degree mark, when I start "turning" right... It's attitude is never correct. I get to orbit, but always wasting a lot of fuel, and my orbits are usually very elliptical, but hey, I'll learn... Just feel sorry for my crew
[thread=28352]The Drawing Board[/thread] has useful tutorials for both newbies and veterans alike. There's some tutorials about how to make orbit too. I suggest you check it out.
Welcome to the forum, Zulu. Keep reading and you'll learn so much, you'll be on your way to ultimate KSP proficiency in no time.
